amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to maintain more than 65 million barrels of oil in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

action.text: Sanders amendment (A014) modified by unanimous consent. The modification strikes the figure "65 million" and inserts "647 million".
On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A014) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 267 (Roll no. 262).
